::Battera::

She finally stopped blushing and looked at him."Yes. Well, wouldn't 
you like to live in peace. Wouldn't you like to be able to walk 
outside and not have to worry about being attcked?"
She walked quickly to keep up with him. She was still clutching the 
bowl.  
"Don't you think it would be nice to be able to live and not have to 
fight all the time?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm smiles. "Allright! Its this way."
> 
> He walks down a hallway, looking back at her, "So you're here for 
peace, eh?"
